title: Palatial Long Beach Luxury with Room Upgrade, US$50 Dining Credit & Whale-Watching Cruise Discount (Select Packages Only)
description: Slip into a Californian state of mind with a luxurious coastal-meets-city stay at the palatial Renaissance Long Beach Hotel. Set in the thriving downtown centre of Long Beach, you'll be in a prime location to explore the independent boutiques and dining havens of the East Village, while being walking distance to spectacular beaches. Breathe in the refreshing breeze from the Pacific Ocean as you sample creative cocktails on SIP Bar Loungeâ€™s outdoor patio, or the luxurious rooftop pool while soaking up sparkling city vistas.
offer_address: 111 E Ocean Blvd, Long Beach, CA 90802, United States
